@@ -0,0 +1,80 @@

+
+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/op.h"
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+
+REGISTER_OP("BatchNormalizeTraining")
+    .Input("input: T")
+    .Input("scale: T")
+    .Input("bias: T")
+    .Input("running_mean: Ref(T)")
+    .Input("running_inv_var: Ref(T)")
+    .Output("out: T")
+    .Output("save_mean: T")
+    .Output("save_inv_var: T")
+    .Attr("T: {float}")
+    .Attr("epsilon: float")
+    .Attr("exponential_average_factor: float")
+    .Doc(R"doc(
+Perform batch normalization using batch statistics.
body:
Correct me if I am wrong, but I do not see any support for Cudnn batch norm in the NHWC format in the header.
For now I will do the NHWCToNCHW calls and profile.
